message.message: Failed executing DbCommand (333ms) [Parameters=[@__request_OperationalAddressId_0='?' (DbType = Int64), @__request_CompanyId_1='?' (DbType = Int64)], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30'] SELECT `b`.`Id`, `b`.`CompanyId`, `b`.`InvoiceId`, `b`.`OperationalAddressId`, `b`.`ServiceCrmId`, `b`.`ServicePriceCrmId`, `b`.`ServiceTypeId`, `b`.`Status`, `s`.`FrequencyType`, `i`.`Id`, `i`.`Amount`, `i`.`CompanyId`, `i`.`InvoiceCrmId`, `i`.`InvoiceId`, `i`.`Link`, `i`.`RegisterDate`, `i`.`Status` FROM `BaseServiceAppointment` AS `b` INNER JOIN `ServiceAppointmentEmergency` AS `s` ON `b`.`Id` = `s`.`Id` INNER JOIN `Invoice` AS `i` ON `b`.`InvoiceId` = `i`.`Id` WHERE (((`b`.`OperationalAddressId` = @__request_OperationalAddressId_0) AND (`b`.`CompanyId` = @__request_CompanyId_1)) AND (`i`.`Status` = 'paid')) AND (`b`.`Status` <> 6)
